methods.name: getLabel
methods.description: Returns the display name of this item in the picklist.

methods.name: getValue
methods.description: Returns the value of this item in the picklist.

methods.name: isActive
methods.description: Returns true if this item must be displayed in the drop-down list for the picklist field in the user interface, false otherwise.

methods.name: isDefaultValue
methods.description: Returns true if this item is the default value for the picklist, false otherwise. Only one item in a picklist can be designated as the default.
